name: reflection room five
description:
no.5 is a special edition to say thank you to all supportive and encouraging people. whenever there is a point you think you are stuck, these people turn the wheel a little further🖤🖤🖤

reflection room is an experimental project to explore the impact of changing light and shadow - how does it influence you, does it calm you down, does it inspire, give you energy..?...and it is simply a relaxing way to play with black and white, with movement, digital mirrors, lenses, distortion and perspective. the works are based on painted or photographed flowers which i animated. i'm very interrested in every aspect and tranformation of flowers and for a photographer light and shadow always is a big part of the work. so reflection room is an inner space to think about this, a room with digital tools to play with reflection and in the end a virtual square to show you the results.
